ShortDescription.Value: Removes death in your cities - so fast, it's like magic.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Magic Hearse (Redux)
## No More Death-Waves!
- City clogged with hearses and annoying hearse notifications? - Citizens magically float away after death. - Crematoriums and cemetaries are now optional tourist attractions.
## Features - Just install the mod (keep the checkbox enabled in Options) - Automatic: enable/disable without restarting the game. - Remove all other Hearse/Deathcare mods to avoid conflicts!! - This mod does not use Harmony or Reflection (increases reliability on game patch days). - Safe to remove any time. Works with new and existing saves. - Keep the cemeteries for the looks, just know that MHR has you covered.
## Support and Feedback - If the mod works for you, give it a Like! - Feedback in Github, Forums, or Discord links.
## 11 Languages - Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, 简体中文 Simplified Chinese - Italiano Italian, 한국어 Korean, 日本語 Japanese, English - 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese, Polski Polish, Português Brazilian
## Credits - River-Mochi - author - Thanks to Wayze, creator of the original Magical Hearse - Necko1996 - testing, screenshots
## How it works - If the citizen is flagged as dead and needs transport, it's cleaned up. Looks like magic but the secret is flags. Mod does not stop death - it's just very fast corpse cleanup. - Great for your next zombie apocalypse.
